file_path.description: Path to the source file. Supports Rust (.rs), JSON (.json), Markdown (.md), and other languages.

selector.description: Text-anchored node selector using exact text and AST navigation

anchor_text.description: Exact text to find in the source code as an anchor point. Must be unique enough to identify the target location.

ancestor_node_type.description: AST node type to walk up to from the anchor point (e.g., 'function_item', 'struct_item', 'pair', 'list_item')

content.description: Content to insert after the target node

preview_only.description: If true, show preview of changes without writing to file

language.description: Optional language hint. If not provided, language will be detected from file extension.
